short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful Browser Cleaning - Cache, Cookies, History Gone!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clean Wave is your go-to browser extension for maintaining a clutter-free and secure browsing environment. 

Features:
- Remove browsing data: cache, cookies, download history, browsing history, storage data.
- Forcefully refresh tabs without cache.
- Remove cookies on a specific website.
- Specify time intervals (e.g., last 1 hour or 24 hours).
